newsitem.title: SWEDEN: SAS launches special summer rates in Europe.
newsitem.headline: SAS launches special summer rates in Europe.

text.p: Scandinavian airline SAS said on Friday it was launching special summer prices in European cities under which a passenger could take another traveller for half the price of the first ticket.
The special would run from June 15 to August 31 and included some 35 European capitals and cities, the airline said.
"Two adults can travel together from Stockholm to Vienna for example for a total of 4,800 crowns -- 3,200 for the first passenger and 1,600 for the accompanying traveller," SAS said in a statement.
Children between the ages of 12 and 17 could travel with adults also for special rates, the airline said.
Tickets must be purchased seven days ahead of the departure date. The trip must include a Saturday night stay over, it said.
